title: Looking for temp friends.
body:
Apparently I didn't submit this. Boards bug OP.

Looking for some more guys to help record more shurima games.
If there is alot of you I'll either swap people out after games.
Or go into Customs and have Team V teams.

-----

Fitz recorded game 1 (Which was yesterday)
with @Marauder.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Io_IbkeespY

replies.body: I'll come add Gentili. Gold iv
Letting you know that its shuriman champs only.
